text: Allen's Opera House is a historic commercial building in Cozad, Nebraska. It was built by Charles Hart and Mr. Shanholt in 1906 for Charles E. Allen, a businessman and banker who co-owned the Cozad State Bank and the Allen General Store. With Both businesses were located on the first floor. The building has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since September 28, 1988. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Dawson County, Nebraska Category:Commercial buildings completed in 1906 Category:1906 establishments in Nebraska
title: Allen's Opera House
